theme-name.name: System theme
theme-name.description: Theme to use for gtk+ and qt.

icon-theme-name.name: Icon theme
icon-theme-name.description: Icon theme to use for the panel, nautilus etc

gtk-theme-name.name: Gtk+ theme
gtk-theme-name.description: Basename of the default theme used by gtk+.

gtk-cursor-theme-name.name: Cursor theme
gtk-cursor-theme-name.description: Cursor theme name. Used only by Xservers that support the Xcursor extension.

gtk-font-name.name: Default font
gtk-font-name.description: Name of the default font used by gtk+.

gtk-key-theme-name.name: Gtk+ Keybinding Theme
gtk-key-theme-name.description: Basename of the default keybinding theme used by gtk+.

xft-hintstyle.name: Xft hintstyle
xft-hintstyle.description: What degree of hinting to use; hintnone, hintslight, hintmedium, or hintfull.

xft-rgba.name: Xft RGBA
xft-rgba.description: Type of subpixel antialiasing; none, rgb, bgr, vrgb, vbgr.

cursor-blink-time.name: Cursor Blink Time
cursor-blink-time.description: Length of the cursor blink cycle, in milliseconds.

gtk-cursor-blink-timeout.name: Cursor Blink Timeout
gtk-cursor-blink-timeout.description: Time after which the cursor stops blinking, in seconds.

double-click-time.name: Double click time
double-click-time.description: Maximum time allowed between two clicks for them to be considered a double click (in milliseconds).

double-click-distance.name: Double click distance
double-click-distance.description: Maximum distance allowed between two clicks for them to be considered a double click (in pixels).

dnd-drag-threshold.name: Dnd drag threshold
dnd-drag-threshold.description: A palette of named colors for use in themes.

gtk-cursor-theme-size.name: Timeout before click repeat
gtk-cursor-theme-size.description: Timeout in milliseconds before a click starts repeating (onspinner buttons for example).

gtk-recent-files-max-age.name: Gtk Recent Files Max Age
gtk-recent-files-max-age.description:
The maximum age, in days, of the items inside the recently used resources list.
        Items older than this setting will be excised from the list.
        If set to 0, the list will always be empty; if set to -1, no item will be removed.

xft-dpi.name: Xft DPI
xft-dpi.description:
Resolution for Xft, in 1024 * dots/inch. -1 to use default value.
        Do not modify it manually.

enable-event-sounds.name: Enable sound event
enable-event-sounds.description: Whether to play any event sounds at all.

enable-input-feedback-sounds.name: Enable input feedback sounds
enable-input-feedback-sounds.description: Whether to play event sounds as feedback to user input.

gtk-recent-files-enabled.name: Recent files enabled
gtk-recent-files-enabled.description: Whether GTK+ should keep track of items inside the recently used resources list.

individual-scaling.name: Scaling factors for individual screen
individual-scaling.description: Semicolon-separated list of name=value pairs, as used in QT_SCREEN_SCALE_FACTORS.
individual-scaling.description[zh_CN]: 屏幕缩放，指定不同屏幕的缩放比例

qt-dark-active-color.name: Qt Dark Active Color
qt-dark-active-color.description: Qt Active Color In Dark Theme
